QuestData.Title: Return to Soar
QuestData.Description: <Doctor Malefious hands you a vial full of murky liquid.>$B$BHere you are then, $r. Take this back to the cow and let him know that all debts have been paid. We are officially "square."$B$BNow leave me before I set Jennings upon you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Sintar's Vaccine to Soar Hawkfury at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: <Soar holds the vial up to the sky and examines its contents.>$B$BOnly one thing left to do now.
